Alhama de Granada.title: Alhama de Granada
Alhama de Granada.byline: Alhama de Granada is an old spa village of about 6,000 people (2018) in Granada Province about 50 km from the city of Granada.

Alhambra (California).title: Alhambra (California)
Alhambra (California).byline: Alhambra is a city in the San Gabriel Valley.
